name: Matches Puzzle Game
description:
This is a classic game invented more than 100 years ago.
Solve matchstick puzzles by moving, adding and removing matches until you find the right solution.

name: Magic Touch: Wizard for Hire
description: Use you finger to draw shapes on the touchscreen. Match the shapes on balloons to pop them sending Knights smashing to the ground. Keep the Enemy from reaching the castle for as long as possible!

name: The Moron Test
description:
Graduate from Moron to Genius as you tap, twist, and shake your way through these fun and tricky mind challenges.

The tricky puzzles include questions that test your memory, reading comprehension, math, patience, problem solving and more! No two questions are exactly alike, but they’re all made to boggle the mind.

name: Stickman Downhill
description: Experience ultra realistic and fast paced action packed downhill biking in stunning environments. Choose from more than 15 different bikes, including full suspension bikes, retro bikes or even electro bikes. Bike in various different locations, ranging from tracks in deep forest to mountain tracks high up in the air. All bikes are unique designed with stunning realistic physics.

name: Tupsu
description: Sin descripción

name: Brain Teaser: Memory Limit
description: A memory game where new rules get added each round, and you have to keep following them in order, while they get more numerous and harder every time.

name: Trial Xtreme 3
description: Trial Xtreme 3, will take your breath away with its new innovations and amazing features. Tackle 137 completely original courses, fighting your friends for the race, win while carefully controlling your bike to ensure that you don’t fall victim to one of the many hundreds of mines, water pipes, or wrecked cars that are standing in your way.

name: Ghaib
description: Ghaib is a first person action horror game played on a desktop platform. Unlike the FPS game in general, Ghaib uses Al-Qur'an as the main weapon to conquer enemies. To fight the enemy and attack, the player must read the verses displayed on the screen.

name: Jurig Escape
description: Jurig Escape is a 15-minute Free Third-Person Survival Horror game. You will play as the unnamed high-schooler trapped in a looping nightmare: An "empty" school with a revolver in your hand. Shoot the ghost and collect lost souls and escape this never-ending nightmare.

name: Pulang Insanity: Director's Cut
description: Pulang: Insanity is a psychological horror game set in a mythical culture of Indonesia. the games tell a story about Rudy, a man who once became poor and heavily indebted, he passed his poverty and became prosperous via the “Pesugihan” ritual, yet the happiness didn’t last long.

name: SKYHILL: Black Mist
description:
SKYHILL: Black Mist key features:
- Non-linear exploration
Carve your own way in a semi-open world of Skyhill condominium, but also within infrastructure buildings such as, school, shopping center, business lounge, cinema, underground parking space and variety of technical locations.

- Survival at all cost
You were infected by mysterious black mist and you’re slowly dying. You constantly have to search for medicine to sustain yourself, gather and manage resources, craft new tools and weapons to survive as long as possible in this hostile environment.

- Play Your Way
Solve problems the way You like most, use environment to your advantage, lure enemies into traps, sneak using stealth or hit them hard with brute force. You decide. And… if you die, you die in your own style as well.

- Mysterious Threat
Solve the mystery of dark mist’s origins. Nothing is as it seems, try to distinguish reality from illusions and find out what’s real and what’s not.

name: Quake 1.5
description:
Quake 1.5 is a darkplaces addon mod for the original Quake. Utilizing Seven's SMC 5.30 as a base, it has been expanded to include new features such as weapons, gore, and plenty of level additions.

Quake 1.5 is firstly a weapons overhaul, the original weapon pack's goal was to redo the quake 1 weapons to give them more feedback. Changes in the mod version include things like shell ejection, seeing rockets slide into the tube, additional frames for nailguns and a spin up/down on the SNG like Q2's chaingun.

name: Mario & Luigi
description: Mario & Luigi is an unofficial DOS remake of Super Mario Bros. Just like in the original game, it features Mario the plumber, jumping around, collecting pickups and defeating enemies across Mushroom Kingdom. Mario can find a mushroom which makes him grow, and a fire flower that allows him to shoot fireballs.

name: Team Of Robbers
description: Sin descripción

name: Link the animals
description:
Link the animals is a relaxing, challenging puzzle game where you need to connect each animal with its respective pair. The level ends when all pairs are connected.

* 5 difficulty levels
* More than 340 challenging puzzles
* 20+ animals and other creatures

The game is available for Windows, Linux, Mac, Android and iOS.

name: Disney Twisted-Wonderland
description: Twisted-Wonderland is a Japanese mobile game created by Aniplex and Walt Disney Japan. The character designs, scenario, and concept were designed by Black Butler creator Yana Toboso, focusing on depictions of villains from various Disney franchises.

name: Purple Chicken Spaceman
description: Earth is under attack in this quirky Shoot 'em up! And only one should-be flightless and oddly coloured fowl stands between our world and utter destruction. Join Purple Chicken as he bravely dons his fishbowl space helmet and to space, to liberate the galaxy and stop the alien invasion force before it's too late! Do you have what it takes? Are you chicken enough?

name: Kingdom Hearts III: Re Mind
description:
Kingdom Hearts III Re Mind is a DLC expansion of Kingdom Hearts III. It was released on PlayStation 4 on January 23, 2020, and was released for Xbox One on February 25, 2020.

There are two versions of the DLC available for purchase; a standard edition costing $29.99, and a second edition including a recording of the Kingdom Hearts Orchestra -World of Tres- Osaka performance, costing $39.99. Additionally, a free patch became available shortly before the DLC's release, which grants players the ability to unlock Oathkeeper and Oblivion Keyblades free of charge.

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit I

name: Super Friends Party
description: Play minigames with up to 6 players in this online minigame multiplayer game! Connect up with your friends or strangers as you battle it out to find a champion! All minigames are free to play, so get a friend or 5, what are you waiting for?

name: Fox and Bunny
description: An ancient legend says - who cooks and tastes soup from 4 kinds of mushrooms, he will prove his love to the whole world and will consolidate the respect of ancient spirits.

name: Risk System
description: In the distant future, humanity has discovered a method to replicate matter through the use of a Dimensional Gate. Industry is revolutionized overnight and a short period of chaos gives way to all warring factions uniting under a common banner.A few years pass and the peace brought about by Gate Technology crumbles once a new threat appears; a race of energy parasites that have crossed through the Dimensional Gate by mimicking the very materials humanity had believed they were replicating. Mankind is quickly overtaken as their technology is turned against them and the energy emitted by the parasites begins to take control of those exposed.In an act of desperation, the experimental RSK9 is constructed, a ship made of Pre-Gate materials and technology with the ability to absorb parasite energy and use it to power its incredible arsenal. Piloting the RSK9 is Alys, an ace pilot previously missing in action that has returned seemingly immune to parasite control. Her skill and resistance to the parasite energies influence make her the only pilot capable of preventing the extinction of mankind.NOTE FOR LINUX USERS - Due to game engine limitations we are only able to guarantee compatibility with Ubuntu 18.04.2 LTS 64bit or newer. It is likely it will function on many other Linux distributions but it is impossible currently to be 100% sure. We very much want to support the Linux community and are happy to entertain suggestions on how we may improve compatibility in the future.GAME PLAY:-Increase your B-Meter & firepower quickly by flying as close to enemy fire as possible and absorbing their energy. The closer you fly, the more energy you net!-Fire your weapon while flying close to enemy fire and absorbing to perform powerful "Risk Shots". Enemies destroyed by these powered up shots will turn into energy to power your shield. The best defense is a risky offense!-Fly like an ace pilot and utilize Barrel Rolls to quickly cover vertical space & modify your attack!-Unleash the Barrier Breaker once the B-Meter is full to inflict huge damage on everything in sight!-Playing for points is fun again as higher scores are awarded for explosive bursts of destruction and taking risks! Destroy multiple enemies at once and utilize "Risk Shots" to string together combos and increase your score multiplier!-Experience different facets and paths to the story based on your performance and actions taken during missions!

name: Cosmic Cash
description: Ever wonder what baby a slot machine and a classic shooter would make? Well wonder no more! Cosmic Cash combines the retro action packed feel of arcade shooters with the thrill of winning big at the slots.

name: EscapeeZ
description: Escape your prison.

name: The Last Bullet
description: One man. Dozens upon dozens of hungry zombies. The mission remains: extract the hostages at all costs.

name: Digital Paintball Redux
description: Digital Paintball Redux is an online Multiplayer paintball game setup to give players the best online paintball experience on the market. This first-person shooter consists of maps with different styles of playing formats: woodsball, speedball, airball, and hyperball. The game brings constant action and has an easy learning curve for players coming from any gaming background.

name: Jetlad
description: Jetlad is a challenging jet-fueled platformer. Help Jetlad collect the gems of each level and reach the goal unharmed. Jetlad flies around using his jet-pack. Jetlad will explode when he runs out of fuel or touches any hazards. Are you able to help Jetlad overcome the obstacles that await him?

name: R_sin
description: R_sin is a third-person single-player adventure horror game that combines shooting elements with horror elements.

name: Mermaid Colony
description: Descend into the dark depths of the ocean and rebuild a mythical colony of mermaids which now lies in ruins. At the bottom of the sea an ancient horror slowly awakens...

name: Run Jump Rabbit Turtle
description: Run Jump Rabbit Turtle is a challenging 2D platformer where you play as a rabbit and turtle. The two animals are magically combined by a Monkey Wizard in order to gather magical kiwis for him. As the player you are able to fluidly swap between the pair with simple controls defined by the game's actual title, "Run Jump Rabbit Turtle". The game follows a humorous driven narrative, set in a dangerous cave area drawn in a retro pixel art style.

name: Flaky Bakery
description: A retired hero who is too lazy to bake more than 3 loaves a day. Think you can earn money and not sell out?

name: Fruit Crawler
description: Puzzle through different difficulty levels and hazards. Collect fruit to increase your tail segments. Avoid the pokey bits and explosions. Also, don't run into yourself.

name: Rigid Chess
description: A novelty futuristic, interplanetary themed Chess Set with AI module and many extra features detailed herein!

name: Idle Chess Story
description: Creatures from all over the Galaxy make their way to play on the annual idle chess tournament. In Idle Chess Story You take control of a team of chess units with special abilities to win over your opponents and increase your rank.

name: Smart Gecko
description: You think you're smart in puzzle games? Like challenges in action games? Smart Gecko is a game that combines all this and more, where you must help Tixaz in winning all rooms and prove that it is really very...

name: Board Quizz Adventure
description: Board Quizz Adventure is a fun little party game, perfect to play while having a drink with friends. It’s very accessible to everyone, even people not used to playing video games: you can play without holding a controller. Answer questions to clear the way and reach the objective first!

name: America's Retribution Term 2
description: He's back! The American President is locked and loaded for his second term. Battle your way through the city streets of Chicago to the jungles of Africa fighting terrorists, fascists, fake News media and evil globalists.

name: FreeDiver: Triton Down
description: Freediver: Triton Down is a fully-interactive single-player experience with deep roots in ocean adventure cinema. Freediver delivers the whirlwind fun and thrills of a disaster blockbuster, all in a binge-worthy package.

name: Flipper Mechanic
description: Become a Flipper Mechanic and repair the arcade machines. Look at the old auctions, bring them to the workshop and restore to the state of splendor, selling with profit. Expand your workshop, buy new machines. Modify or build your own. Play & test, and put the best in pubs and earn money.

name: Earthshine
description: This is a small beautiful story about love, about search of your purpose in life, and other things that people think about looking at the stars...

name: Boxing Champs
description: Step into the ring and become a boxing champ! Move up the world rankings, remain undefeated and unify all the titles to become the undisputed champion of the world. Boxing Champs a fast paced simulation / arcade boxing game.

name: Not So Heart
description: Not So Heart is a retro hardcore platformer. But it has a secret. Don't try to fix anything.

name: The Red Prison
description: The Red Prison is a roguelike based on the OGL-content of the SRD for 5th edition Dungeons & Dragons.

name: Herman 2
description: "Herman 2" is a fast-paced, occasionally brutal, humorous and challenging platformer with cool music. The game has 50 levels, some very tricky digging and resource management puzzles, interesting & tough enemies, and many game mechanics. Climb, dig, throw, jump, kick, jetpack, duck, slide, and fall your way to salvation!

name: Beekeeper
description: "Beekeeper" is a game of the genre of independent economic strategy, in which you will take on the role of a debut beekeeper, making his first steps in the honey business. You will take the helm of your own company and lead it to the top of the rankings.

name: The Cat in 14a
description: The Cat in 14a is an interactive film noir about a cat living in a 1950s New York apartment.

name: Self Shot
description: Teenager Ren, able to dive into the subconscious, penetrates into the depths of memory where she is waiting for childhood fears and complexes, with which she has to cope to reach the bottom of consciousness

name: Endless Turns
description: Endless Turns is a very simple and easy to understand game, but very fun and addictive, perfect to spend a relaxed time.

name: Tetromino Attack
description: Tetromino Attack is a very simple and easy to understand game, but very fun and addictive, perfect to spend a relaxed time.

name: Kurr Snaga
description: Kurr Snaga is a fast-paced first person melee brawler where players act as the last Orc left from their tribe taking revenge on the evil humans.

name: Loco Parentis
description: Co-op horror game, where you have to help a little girl find her mother and figure out what is really happening in your house and who your neighbors really are.

name: Lonely Skies
description: Pilot your rickety airship along a dangerous journey in a 2D vehicle adventure game, stealing parts and fuel to keep your ship running long enough to reach safety.

name: Viking Sisters
description: Long before modern day women shattered the glass ceiling, the Viking Sisters were showing evildoers what girl power is all about! Join Helga and Brunhilda on their quest to save the men of their village from the spells of a wicked Sorceress.

name: Reflections of Life: Equilibrium - Collector's Edition
description: The Queen of Creatos is missing, and if you don't get her back soon... the entire world will crumble!

name: Super Recoilfight
description: Super Recoilfight is a one-button projectile brawler-shooter that recalls the fun of a coin-op arcade for up to 4 players on a single keyboard. Time your shots right to win against your friends, AI or both.

name: Idle Guardians
description: Recruit heroes and idle your way to glory! Fight in dungeons, defeat powerful raid bosses and find legendary items!

name: Chess Arena
description:
A Chinese indie game that combines Xiangqi, Chinese Chess, with a fighting or beat 'em up game.

The chess component follows the standard rules, except for the removal of check/checkmate. Instead of a piece being taken the game enters an arena mode and the two pieces fight with a top-down perspective to decide on the result.
Each piece plays differently due to their attacks and abilities.
The losing piece is destroyed but a pieces health is persistent making repeated fights dangerous.

The game's single player has 50 levels that consist of games in various stages of play that must be completed in order to unlock the next level.
The online multiplayer is player hosted which reveals the hosts IP address if used.

name: The Tale of Greenbrier
description: Follow the journey of Genevieve Goldenglow as she sets off on an adventure to save her village from destruction by an encroaching corruption.

name: Transport Fever 2
description: The classic transport simulation genre has a new gold standard with Transport Fever 2. Discover a whole new world by navigating transport routes through land, water and air. May progress and prosperity find their way!

name: Instinct Rush
description: Hit vehicle, rub guardrail, cut human body, and drive freely.

name: Last Hope Z - VR
description: Developed exclusively for virtual reality the game "Last Hope Z" gives you an incredible drive of races and shooters at the same time. Spin the wheel, shoot sharp, discover new guns, change and upgrade cars, and save your four-footed friend! You will have to face an intricate and extremely realistic challenge...

name: Werewolf Stand-alone
description: This is a game of character reasoning, the stand-alone version of Werewolf

name: Transformice Adventures
description: Transformice Adventures is a multiplayer action-RPG set in the world of Transformice, featuring combat, exploration, pet care and a storyline! Stay tuned for development news!

name: New Yankee in King Arthur's Court 4
description: Set off on a time-tripping adventure to the medieval past to face fantastical foes and solve a mystery of legends and magic! Epic in scope, New Yankee in King Arthur's Court 4 is Sir John's biggest, boldest adventure yet!

name: Tanknarok
description: Tanknarok is a fast paced couch/online action game where 2-4 tanks duke it out in a wide range of arenas, with tons of explosive powerups and deadly hazards.

name: Sqr 4
description: Sqr 4 is a colourful mathematical puzzle. The player's point is to make each line's digit sum equal to appropriate column's sum using addition (+), substraction (-), multiplication (×), division (÷), squaring (^), square root extraction operation (√), concatenation (∨) and clipping (∧) only.

name: Super Welder
description: Super Welder is a simple and easy to play game that can play all levels with just a mouse.

name: Delivered!
description: Delivered! is an addictive logical game where you have to divide your attention and concentrate on many things at the same time to successfully finish the levels!

name: Gravitura
description: Pilot a ship around asteroids, planets, singularities. Learn how to put your ship into orbit, sling shot, and use gravity to your advantage. Perform precise maneuvers to move your way through the 35 levels in this highly challenging game. Build, share, download custom levels.

name: Ruins to Rumble
description: Ruins to Rumble is a sandbox colony survival in a 2D side scroller environment. Build, fight, explore and defend to claim victory against other factions and monsters.

name: Knights of the Silver Table
description: An Action Packed, 2D Retro Style Action RPG. Inspired by the 16-Bit Era of Games.

name: Diorama Dungeoncrawl
description: Low-Poly 3D Diorama Action! Inspired by 16-bit action games, Diorama Dungeoncrawl brings that style of challenge to a fully 3D Environment! Battle monsters in your quest to defeat the Necromancer!

name: Pupil: Wandering VR
description: Pupil : Wandering is an Asian-style horror VR game. The game focuses on an immersive horror atmosphere. All key items and game hints can only be found using the "Moon Lantern", a main feature that brings to light an extraordinary and truly terrifying experience.

name: Retro Pixel Racers
description: Retro Pixel Racers is a fun top-down arcade racing game with a retro style graphics where you control of little cars racing over exciting tracks. Start your engines and prepare for the craziest and most addictive racing game ever. Fast-paced racing game with a fresh interpretation of the 16-bit style.

name: Summer Rush
description: In this classic Time Management game you have to manage a beautiful beach resort and make good business in the summer rush!

name: Hockey Player VR
description: Play hockey in first person view and develop your own tactics and tricks. Finally, a hockey game where you have 100% control. Test out your puck skills in online multiplayer mode.

name: Sector's Edge
description: Sector's Edge is a fast-paced destructive voxel-based first person shooter in which two teams of 8 fight for zone domination across various planets.

name: AvoCuddle
description: "AvoCuddle" tells a tale of true love! An emotional action adventure through the galaxy searching and seeking to free your soul mate. Explore beautiful and dangerous planets, fight it's special creature and solve puzzles , through a visually stunning 2D-platformer.

name: Wave Circles
description: Wave Circles is a rhythm-based VR experience that promotes creativity by empowering players to drop their own rhythmic flows and design their own beatmaps. Don't hesitate to create and share your own masterpiece on YouTube with YouTube streaming and LIV integrated into the game. Challenge your friends in a virtual rhythmic dance-off or share your moves with anyone in the world.

name: Unforetold: Witchstone
description: Unforetold: Witchstone is an RPG sandbox with a deep, reactive influence system that allows you to shape the fate of the world.

name: FluidLander
description: In Fluid Lander, you can operate a spaceship in a fluid-simulated field and head to the goal. A fast computational fluid dynamics program is embedded in this game. This is not just a demo of physics. Let's collect rare-earth elements and save the world.

name: Adore
description: Adore is an action creature-collecting game where you build your team of unique creatures and go on a journey to resurrect the God of the Creatures.

name: Claw Staff
description: Jump and cling through a post post post-apocalyptic world populated by strange creatures and claim the Moon for your power-hungry Emperor!

name: Cossanox
description: Embark on a journey through space and time, battling an ancient alien menace to save the Universe. Using the all powerful Cossanox this alien seeks to reshape the known universe in order to spread and consume. You and your crew must put an end to the threat and recover the Cossanox.

name: There the Light
description: Explore an unknown and abandoned world. Each step, each puzzle, brings you closer to discovering the history and secrets of a lost civilization. Can you find the light?

name: Winter Fury: Longest Road
description: A Blitzkrieg, a horrifying parade of destructive machinery, approaches the Allied front. The Allies' sole chance at surviving the devastating onslaught is a soldier with a classified, experimental M-4 Sherman tank. Turn the tide of war with a combination of steel resolve and good ol' American ingenuity.

name: Of Bird and Cage
description: Of Bird and Cage is an Action-Adventure Music Video Game! A first of a kind music album that is experienced entirely through a video game featuring world-renowned artists from (ex) Guns N' Roses, Epica, Within Temptation, (ex) Evanescence and many others!

name: Golden Treasure: The Great Green
description: Golden Treasure is a game for those who carry dragons in their hearts. Hunt, explore, survive, and become Great among the True Children of Sun and Earth.

name: Tiger Tank 59 I Winter Assault
description: Players need to control their tanks, through the enemy lines, break the enemy base, or defeat the enemy tanks, open the way for the Allied offensive.

name: Who We Are Now
description: Who We Are Now is a queer, post-apocalyptic visual novel set ten years after a nuclear war scoured the earth. It follows Wes, a young man who, drowning in the memories of everyone he's lost, returns to a settlement called Home in search of something to ease his pain.

name: Star Shift
description: The year is 2357. Humans have explored the stars and colonized many worlds under the authority of the Earth Systems Alliance (ESA), a government controlled by powerful interstellar organizations. Embroiled in a civil war, the fabric of reality is not what it seems.

name: Pixelarium
description: Pixelarium is an evolved color by numbers game, where you can paint by numbers, letters or icons, with three game modes for diferent moods. Also, you can use Steam workshop to upload your own creations.

name: Cell Defender
description: Four warriors take risks in the human body. They will encounter many enemies from outside, including bacteria, viruses, fungi, parasites and so on. They will also face infected cells and cancer cells. Finally, they will strive to wipe out the enemy and usher in victory.

name: FIA European Truck Racing Championship
description: The only official simulation that features all the unique characteristics of the ETRC and offers all racing fans a completely new driving experience: race a giant 5-tonne, 1,000-horsepower truck against 12 competitors while respecting the race rules to avoid penalties.

name: 11th Dream
description: 11th Dream is fast-paced third person abstract shooter aimed at fast runners and hard-core difficulty enthusiasts. 11th includes both skirmish maps and campaign aimed at fast runners and hard-core difficulty enthusiasts. It is a game that you can try to beat while you render your video, waiting for the meeting or for a reply from your friend. Besides the solo-hardcore experience, 11th Dream delivers fully scrip-table in-game map editor, daily scoreboards to compete with other players and full on-line stats and leader-boards.

name: Rescue bomber
description: Experience upgraded version of bomberman! Story: The evil Lord of Skull kidnapped all your fellows form the village and you have to rescue them my friend. Using bombs fight freedom for one you love. You are the hope, you are the rescue bomber!

name: HyperQ: The 4Dimensional Roguelike
description: HyperQ is a 4Dimensional Roguelike Horror Shooter. It looks like The Binding of Isaac and Crimsonland melted into one & spiced with a bit of absurd humor. The stroryline is inspired by science-fiction horror movie Cube2: HyperCube.

name: Fog of War: The Battle for Cerberus
description: Take command of an off-world fighting force! Use tactics, diplomacy and your own skills to find a way to victory. Who says a sublieutenant can’t win the war?

name: Grit: Overworld Survival
description: Grit is a realistic overworld survival roguelike, where a rat stew is probably the best meal you'll get and starvation is always on your heels. Search for edible plants, defend yourself against local predators, build shelter and figure out how to get back to civilization.

name: Raid of Regions
description: Raid of Regions is a multi-team tactical shooter set on a future post war era. Every match is a heart pounding 4v4v4v4 battle between agents with customizable loadout, fighting together with their unique gears and advance gadgets.

name: Platonic Paranoia
description: Amaze yourself with platonic paranoias! Platonic Paranoia is an adventure game with an amazing story and unique puzzles.

name: Real Scary
description: Psychological horror perfect for a late night of gaming in the dark with your headphones in.

name: The Scrounge Recruit Program
description: You are a teen who has stumbled upon an organization called "The scrounge", Your task is to complete the recruit program filled with puzzles and tasks to see if you have what it takes. Failing to complete the recruit program results in death.

name: Beatcrash
description: Beatcrash is a VR rhythm game. You definitely get a workout with this game.

name: Country Girl Keiko
description: Play as Keiko, a socially awkward woman living in a small country village. Explore the town and help her overcome her social anxiety, so she can thrive at her university.

name: Cynk 3030
description: Cynk 3030 is a whirlwind indie-roguelike game in the cyberpunk stylistic without a chance to continue! Kill - dodge - boost!

name: Charterstone: Digital Edition
description: Build and discover in Charterstone - a digital board game campaign. Shape your village into the new Eternal City!

name: Gunship Recon
description: A simple operation helicopter arcade game. There are various missions such as destruction of enemy weapons, rescue of hostages, assassination and destruction of enemy facilities.

name: ReflexShot
description: ReflexShot is a small game that help you practice shooting target in video game, to help you practice fast shooting in fps games. The game provides rifle practice, target shooting, small ball shooting and other practice modes.

name: Space Duke
description: Soaring in space, living in a fierce exchange of fire, this is the Space Duke, a small 2D space flight shooting game.

name: BirdGut
description: BirdGut is a hand-drawn 2d puzzle-platformer from the perspective of an outcast bee who gets eaten by a bird, and discovers that the bird's internal organs are not organs at all, but facilities in which the consumed insects are brainwashed and enslaved. Experience this bizarre one-man project for yourself.

name: King of the Cul-De-Sac
description: An Interactive Comic with PUNCHING in it.

name: Sequela
description: Some sequelae cannot be seen, but they've been there all the time.

name: Love 3: Love Cube
description: Things are about to change for Ichinari Tsuzurigi, an adult comics artist living in poverty. Blessed by his "Fates", he is facing a turning point of his career, and three women are going to live together with him...

name: Vampire Physics
description: Sin descripción

name: Joe Jump Impossible Quest
description: Joe Jump Impossible Quest is a runner game in which we are a lumberjack on his journey through the mountains. Throw axes to destroy obstacles, dodge dangers and keep running to arrive on time to a very important appointment.

name: Arcade Archives: Psycho Soldier
description: Arcade Archives: Psycho Soldier is a port of the late 80's action game Psycho Soldier. Play as the Two Soldiers of Light, Athena Asamiya and Sie Kensou, and use their psychic powers to defeat the otherworldly monster Sigma! Fill up the Psycho Gauge for a Psycho Ball attack! The super items inside of eggs can be used to perform amazing transformations!

name: SkillGrid
description: Sin descripción

name: God of War II
description:
A remaster of God of War II, an action-adventure hack-and-slash video game developed by Santa Monica Studio and published by Sony Computer Entertainment (SCE). The game is rooted in Greek mythology and unfolds in ancient Greece, revolving around the theme of vengeance. The protagonist, Kratos, is the new God of War, having defeated the former, Ares. However, Kratos is betrayed by Zeus, the King of the Olympian gods, who not only strips him of his godhood but also kills him. Dragged slowly to the Underworld, Kratos is rescued by the Titan Gaia, who guides him to seek out the Sisters of Fate. These entities have the power to enable time travel, allowing Kratos to prevent his betrayal, and ultimately seek revenge on Zeus.

The remaster features full HD resolution complete with 2X anti-aliased graphics running at 60 frames per second.

name: God of War
description:
A remaster of God of War, an action-adventure hack-and-slash video game developed by Santa Monica Studio and published by Sony Computer Entertainment (SCE). Loosely inspired by Greek mythology, it unfolds in ancient Greece with vengeance as its central theme. The player takes on the role of Kratos, the protagonist, a Spartan warrior devoted to the Olympian gods. Tasked by the goddess Athena, Kratos is assigned to eliminate Ares, the God of War and Kratos' former mentor. Ares had deceitfully manipulated Kratos into killing his wife and daughter. As Ares attacks Athens fueled by hatred for Athena, Kratos embarks on a quest to locate Pandora's Box, the sole object capable of permanently stopping the vengeful god.

The remaster features full HD resolution complete with 2X anti-aliased graphics running at 60 frames per second.

name: Arizona Sunshine: The Damned DLC
description: In Arizona Sunshine - The Damned DLC, fans of the franchise get to discover a brand-new chapter preceding the Arizona Sunshine story so far, crawl into the skin of an all-new protagonist, and explore an iconic megastructure infested by undead as they put their VR zombie survival skills to the test in the largest Arizona Sunshine mission to date.

name: Overpass
description: In Overpass the player takes control of powerful buggies and quads, scrabbling across extreme tracks and very hazardous terrain. This simulation, unique in its genre, pits the player against craggy slopes and puts their cool-headedness to the test throughout technical obstacle courses along wilderness tracks.

name: Arpeggio of Blue Steel: Ars Nova - Re:Birth
description: Sin descripción

name: MudRunner: Old-timers
description:
Expand your MudRunner experience with the Old-timers DLC. Drive 2 new vintage General Motors trucks and explore the brand new Rocky Hills map designed to challenge your pick-up truck mastery.

This pack includes:
The Rocky Hills map, a brand new sandbox environment without garages.
Chevrolet Napco 3100 (1957, 4x4 scout vehicle).
GMC DW950 (1952-54, truck).
Loaded log cart add-on, able to carry 2 points.
Scout trailer add-on, fitted with 1 garage point.

name: MudRunner: The Valley
description: Expand your MudRunner experience with The Valley DLC. Get behind the wheel of 3 new vehicles and discover a huge new summer forest map designed to take full advantage of your heavy-weight trucks: The Valley. Once downloaded, the additional content will be available in-game.

name: MudRunner: The Ridge
description: Expand your MudRunner experience with The Ridge Free DLC. Roll out with 2 new vehicles in a new map where a huge mountain ridge sits in the center. Travel across this steepy environment, challenge yourself by scavenging the map and complete demanding objectives! The DLC contains the Ridge map, 2 new vehicles and 6 add-ons.

name: Space Company Simulator
description: Space Company Simulator presents the most authentic take on running a space corporation to date. From assembling a world-class team and researching new technologies to handling your space missions, players will be immersed in the intricate details of space exploration.

name: Gnomes Garden 3 In 1 Bundle
description: Head out with the gnomes on a journey in this exciting fantasy strategy game, Gnomes Garden! Construct buildings and manage resources, use powerful magic and restore ancient magical gardens.

name: Memoirs of Magic
description: Memoirs of Magic is a Free to Play Action Adventure, FPS, Role Playing Game inspired by classic games of the DOS/N64/PS1 era!

name: Sky TD: Tower Defense Strategy Game
description: Tower Defense developed by a small indie-team of the TD fans. Just a classic TD style without heroes, in-apps, pay-to-win and so on.

name: The Hunt - Sophie's Journey
description: Prepare yourself for a journey across half the globe, threatened by environmental hazards, all kind of vermins and treacherous people.

name: The Red Reactor
description: The Red Reactor is a game that you will build and defend with first person features.

name: Ritual: Crown of Horns
description: Ritual: Crown of Horns is a slaughterhouse. A violent, fast-paced action game set in an alternate Wild West, an absurd, acid-fueled vision of hellish frontier. It's a fast paced 3D top-down base defense shooter, using a selection of best horde-mode mechanics.

name: In the Pause Between the Ringing
description: In the Pause between the Ringing is a rumination about completion, about territorial margins and about the haunting of bodies and memories that are translated across borders. It is an adaption of an unpublished story written by Mir Umar Hassan for the editor of the Malwa Chronicle in the July of 1958.

name: Eleven Prophecies
description: Defend colonists against relentless waves of ruthless insects with nothing more than your wits, your determination, and a sub-orbital 3d-printer. In a distant corner of the galaxy, what was meant to be a routine repair job has turned into a nightmarish scenario for a young technician thrust upon the front lines of a crisis.

name: Super Co-op Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: Beat Saber Origins
description: Sin descripción

name: Scrap Arms
description:
Scrap Arms is a Roguelike RPG, inspired by Mystery Dungeon. It combines the randomization of maps, grid and turn-based gameplay of traditional roguelikes together with story-driven worlds of RPGs. A story of home, family and an obsession for the unobtainable.

Play as Ayo and Karin, new budding Scavengers, as they journey through the Caves, collecting scraps along the way and helping solve the problems of their fellow townsfolk of Reeds.

name: Aliens: Colonial Marines - Stasis Interrupted
description:
'Stasis Interrupted' is the final piece of Aliens: Colonial Marines DLC telling the story of what happened to Hicks between Aliens and Alien³.

In this new campaign you play as 3 different characters through an interlocking story.
Waking up unexpectedly from hypersleep, Lisbeth and others must figure out why the spaceship they are on, the Legato, has been diverted to intercept the Sulaco leaving LV-426's orbit.

Fight your way through the alien infested spaceship, find out what Michael Weyland is after and discover what truly happened to Hicks.

name: Dustnet
description: Dustnet is the last remaining de_dust2 server, join an asymmetrical cross-platform deathmatch as a computer, virtual reality, or augmented reality player.

name: Blacklist Brigade
description: Blacklist Brigade is a co-op focused top-down shooter game, where players as a part of a mercenary group fight against banana republic dictators and other evil scoundrels.

name: Puzzletime: Lovely Girls
description: Puzzletime: Lovely Girls is a classic jigsaw puzzle game in which you need to assemble an image-scene with one of the beautiful girls from many details. The game allows you to relax for an exciting gameplay and get to know the life of 5 beauties during 20 puzzle-scenes.

name: Rick Rack
description: Rick Rack is city driving game, in 1970s European town. Take control of the wheel of 15 different characters living in Times-Ville by driving to their daily commute. REWIND TIME to undo the accidents that happen on the road.Reaching on Time is just as important as reaching safely.

name: Never Let Me Awake
description: A first-person psychological survival horror game

name: Speedrun Squad
description: Choose a character, select a world, and GO! The goal is simple: complete the levels as fast as you can. While mistakes are unlimited, they only slow down your race to the end. Precise platformer gameplay combined with the different abilities of each player makes each playthrough different.

name: Brukel
description: A first-person exploration game based on the actual memories of a 92-year-old grandmother, told to players in her own voice. Take pictures of what remains of her abandoned childhood home to uncover the dark, traumatic events that she had to fight through as a teenage girl.

name: Unsubscribed: The Game
description: Unsubscribed is a 2019 Canadian 'found footage comedy horror' game made by Alain Lagace (BMC Studio) The game is a live action interactive story. It features Goodigo (Twitch Streamer), Undead unicorn (Voice in Sexy Comedy), Jish-Kun (Voice in Jekoos) and Mr Despicable (Actor in Real Life Battle Royal) as friends in an online video chat...

name: P.U.G.S. Agents
description: P.U.G.S. Agents is a classic 2D Top-Down adventure in the 80's style with completely new heroes. Two agents of the secret organization P.U.G.S. must solve the mystery of the mysterious explosion at the local factory. The suspicion of Arch-Evil Jamnior arises and the agent KGB is seen near Fazita Fazinova.

name: Skylight Racer
description: Skylight Racer is a flight based racing game, featuring customizable spaceships. Players must fly through a set of goal rings while avoiding asteroids and other player’s ships, trying to get the fastest completion time.

name: Depths of Madness
description: An atmospheric underwater horror game, can you evade and survive?

name: Gear City Against Chaos
description: 人类对宇宙的探索引来了不可名状的恐怖存在的降临。你将要在机械邪神的威胁下守护并发展轮盘都市，收容并保护失去家园的民众。

name: DearAshely
description: An overview of Steam: To play a designer who has lost himself, shuttling the fantasy of his mind, and exploring the answers that existed in the past.

name: Earth From Another Sun
description: Explore the galaxy, establish and grow your empire, build your trade network, fight alongside the armies you command, and conquer the galaxy! Once you rule over all, remodel the galaxy as you see fit. Long live the Emperor!

name: Lords of the Lockerroom
description: In this 3D physics based "fighter", take control of Aniki, Kazuya, Obama, and the rest of the cast as you duke it out in famous gachimuchi locations to see who's really the boss of the gym!

name: Peanut
description: Peanut is a unique 8 bit-like 2D platform adventure featuring the cute yet determined adventure corgi Peanut Stumpers. Lead him through 45 levels of amazing artwork from across the world and beyond in his quest to save his beloved BAE who has been taken by the Evil Veronica Vet.

name: Pathos
description: Take down a crime syndicate using emotion-altering drugs to manipulate guards and spread chaos among enemies as you make your way to the crime lord.

name: Arcade Classic No. 4: Defender / Joust
description:
A compilation and port of the classic arcade titles.

The games can also be played on the Super Game Boy Peripheral and has altered graphics from the original versions. It does not feature the ability to use the Link Cable, but does have an option for two friends to take turns for each game.

name: Arcade Classic No. 2: Centipede / Millipede
description: A compilation of two classic games, Centipede and Millipede ported over to the Game Boy system with original gameplay. It is also compatible with the Super Game Boy Adapter with backgrounds made to resemble their original arcade casings.

name: Arcade Classic No. 1: Asteroids / Missile Command
description: Arcade Classics: Asteroids + Missile Command is a compilation of the two classic arcade games. This bundle also featured enhanced Super Game Boy support.

name: Apocryph: an old-school shooter
description: Apocryph is a FPS set in a brutal dark fantasy world. It takes it's roots in old-school fantasy shooters, so prepare for intense sword-and-sorcery FPS action amidst forgotten castles, evil shrines and decrepit dungeons! The world of Apocryph is a grim, violent place, harboring magic, dark rituals and dangers around every corner. Wherever you go you'll be facing unrelenting monsters, traps and locked passages, and can only depend on yourself and your equipment to survive the trials.

name: Alien Cruise
description: AlienCruise is an independent side scroller shooting game. Its background is set at the foreseeable future, when protagonist is facing a survival crisis due to deterioration of the Earth’s natural environment. At this point, some scientists detect the existence of other planets outside their own galaxy with other types of life on them, which are very likely to be suitable for human beings. They therefore trained a group of elite space astronauts to look for chances of extending life in the outer space and save their home. These well-trained space warriors need to drive spacecrafts to explore and find a planet suitable for human life. In the unknown space, unprecedented great challenges awaits them.

name: Arcade Archives: Time Pilot
description: Arcade Archives: Time Pilot is a port of the 80's shooting game Time Pilot. Transport five generations into the future and shoot down enemy ships with a full 360 degrees of motion. Rescue parachuters and take out entire enemy formations to earn a high score! Fly into a battle beyond time and space!

name: Casino FunPak
description: In Casino FunPak, you walk around in a casino, partaking in a multitude of games and competing in tournaments to earn as much money as you can. You can play Roulette, Video Poker, Slot Machines, Blackjack and Craps. The tournament mode contains a large tour of the five games.

name: Bird Game +
description:
In Bird Game, a third person flying adventure by Bryan Tabor, a very special adventure awaits you.

Featuring a black and white 3D art style, Bird Game + has you guide a majestic bird through a detailed world that grows all around you, full of challenging obstacles, hostile enemies, and punishing bosses. Complete with a serene soundtrack, a difficult yet relaxing adventure awaits all those who wish to be one with nature. In addition to the game’s 3 main levels, there is an endless mode for players who seek to fly as long as they can through a wondrous, illustrated landscape.

name: Arcade Archives: Terra Force
description: Terra Force is a shoot'em up released by Nichibutsu in 1987. The game was well known for its new tactical features using vertical/horizontal scrolling elements at the time. So eliminate the incoming enemies by using the super destructive hyper missiles.

name: Construction Machines Simulator
description: If you are a fan of construction or destruction this game is for you. Become a boss of the building company. Sit behind the wheels of multiple vehicles like excavators or cranes and expand your business. Build campsites, rental homes, office parks and more.

name: Cosmic Defenders
description: Cosmic Defenders is a 2D fast-paced revolving shooter about a group of unconventional heroes who use the powers of nature in order to stop chaotic aliens from taking over the universe. Cooperate with other guardians, protect the galaxy from the wicked, and restore peace in three game modes: Story Mode, Survival Mode, and Versus Mode.

name: Dawn of Survivors
description: Take on players from around the world in this zombie survivor game. From decaying cities to dark forests, you will fight through hordes of zombies and desperate scavengers. Find food. Build shelter. Team up. Prepare yourself. For when the sun rises, so do the dead.

name: Doggie Ninja: The Golden Mission
description: "Doggie Ninja The Golden Mission" is a PvP action game up to 4 players can play. Let's enjoy this game with anyone, anytime, and anywhere! - Break the castle!! Crush the rivals! Let's throw the wall blocks to break the castle! But watch out! If you break all the blocks holding the roof, the roof will fall down! Once the falling roof hits a Doggie Ninja, He/she will be blown away!

name: Dragon Pinball
description:
The most entertaining Pinball is back! Enjoy Dragon Pinball, a perfect reproduction of a real pinball machine, with all the graphic details and sounds.

Discover all the secrets, complete all the missions and become number 1 in the world or the best among your Friends, posting your high score on the online leaderboard.

name: Hyperlight Ultimate
description:
Hyperlight is an high intensity arcade action game in which you control a spaceship that fights against hordes of evil alien monsters in a virtual cosmic environment. 
 
Your spaceship has a special capability: It can travel at a Faster-Than-Light speed becoming itself the final weapon! By colliding with enemies in this state the ship can instantly destroy everything it touches! 
 
In the game there are also plenty of other bonus, weapons and entities that can help you overcome the many difficulties you’ll be facing, including battles against terrific final bosses that await you on the dark side of the universe!

name: Hindsight 20/20
description: Hindsight 20/20 is a 3D third-person action-adventure game with morality-based decisions. Discover the power of your morality with choices and actions that truly matter.

name: HexaGravity
description: Hexagon tower world of geometry platformer game. Every new world is a new game!

name: Gym Hero - Idle Fitness Tycoon
description: Being fit is healthy and fashionable! But our heroes do not have the motivation to get out for exercises ... and the room is asking for some small improvements!

name: Greco's Hall of Kanji: Learn Japanese (Beginner)
description: Let’s adventure through Greco’s Hall of Kanji!

name: Everybody, Hearts!
description: 'Everybody, Hearts!' is a Nintendo Switch exclusive card game that is now available to download. Experience playing the AI via SINGLEPLAYER mode, have a maximum of 5 players in the online MULTIPLAYER mode, or enjoy LOCAL NETWORK PLAY, accomodating up to 4 players. OPTIONS allow changes to 8 game settings, including Card Passing, Breaking Hearts, or the elusive "Shooting The Moon". Whether by yourself, with friends or online, you may now enjoy Hearts! to your hearts content!

name: Dungeons & Aliens
description: Dungeons & Aliens

name: Disorder
description: A mobile squad-based shooter being developed by NetEase.

name: Fire Emblem Warriors: Special Edition
description: This special edition comes with the Nintendo Switch game, dual-sided poster, three CDs with music from the game, 25 character cards and a slip case to hold the cards

name: Cultist Simulator: Anthology Edition
description:
This bundle includes:

- Cultist Simulator (all 110,000+ words of it)
- The Dancer DLC (peel off your skin at an occult cabaret!)
- The Priest DLC (martyr yourself in the name of St Agnes!)
- The Ghoul DLC (consume the dead, and paint in memory!)
- Cultist Simulator’s soundtrack (let the Mansus ooze into your ears)

name: Blades of Time: Remastered
description: Sin descripción

name: Dragon's Lair: The Legend
description: The Game Boy version for Dragon's Lair is actually a port of Roller Coaster, with its protagonist replaced by Dirk the Daring. Dirk must collect all "lifestones" scattered all around the game world (by walking or jumping) to finally save Princess Daphne. The game world is divided in several screens which can be freely navigated and are a little wider than Game Boy's screen. As Dirk moves the screen will scroll and when its limit is reached, it will flick to a new one. To help him move around, Dirk can jump over bumper cars, flying magic hats and other kinds of moving platforms.

name: Red Solstice 2: Survivors
description: Set 117 years after earth, The Red Solstice 2: Survivors is about the fight once everything has ended. Earth is destroyed but life still lingers and the player's goal is simple... Make it out alive and help humanity survive in this tactical top-down shooter for up to 6 players. Explore the infested Mars colony, fight the hordes of mutant creatures and contain the spreading Biomass.

name: Kingsman: The Secret Service Game
description: Sin descripción

name: Spooktective
description: Sin descripción

name: President F.net
description: The second title in our ‘F' series, in President F.net your task is to get rid of your cards as quickly as possible! The player to clear their cards becomes ‘President' and deals for the next round, so you'll need to rise up the ranks and triumph over your opponents!

name: Lingo
description: Sin descripción

name: Not Not - A Brain Buster
description: Downloaded 10 million times on mobiles, this Top 1 Puzzle game in 14 countries (including USA, UK, Australia and Canada) was remastered and features:

name: Evil Nun
description: mystery and survival in a school garded by a scary evil nun that can hear any noise (be careful!). Evil nun seems to be a mix between a granny and...a ghost, a victim of a zombie plague or any other dead soul. Horror and death are after you, evil nun will kill you if she finds you and the adventure escape will have finished . Hide anywhere !! Inside or out the school ...farm or parking area can be good hiding places !

name: Zara the Fastest Fairy
description: Flying at incredible speed!

name: Xtreme Club Racing
description: Get behind the wheel in one of eShop's most frantic extreme driving games. Travel back in time with a flashback to the ARCADES with pure ARCADE style retro-playability.

name: World Beach Volley: 1992 GB Cup
description: Sin descripción

name: WordZap
description: WordZap is a puzzle video game designed by Michael Crick included with Volume 3 of the Microsoft Entertainment Pack. In WordZap, players race to make proper English words to fill their rack of words, but when one player makes a word already found by the other player, the word is "zapped" from both players' racks. Each round ends when either one player fills the word rack, or time runs out without either player being able to make another word.

name: The Knight & the Dragon
description: During a date with Arthur the chevalier, Princess Daphne is kidnapped by Synge the Dragon She'll be turned into a Lady Dragon once Synge finds all the magic Crystals! Time is running out! Do you got what it takes to rescue Daphne? Temple Tower is right ahead, go and face the Dungeon Boss

name: Teddy The Wanderer: Mountain Hike
description: Teddy The Adventurer brings joy to every youngling, as well as brings educational value.

name: Super Phantom Cat: Remake
description: Super Phantom Cat is a "Pawsome" retro platformer, or what we like to call "Catformer," in which you explore quirky environments, clear purrrfect colorful levels, solve the mysteries shrouding the Phantom world and rescue your kidnapped little sister, Ina.

name: Sudoku Relax
description: The familiar "Sudoku" has become a healing game.

name: Snow Bros. Jr.
description: The Gameboy port of Snow Bros.

name: SlabWell
description: Somewhere deep in the Amazon jungle, lies the finest treasure mankind has ever crafted: The Jade Alpaca. Professional thief duo Sam and Jacky head off on an adventure to recover the mythical artifact, determined to solve the riddles and overcome the challenges that have kept it safe through centuries.

name: Royal Adviser
description: In Royal Adviser the players take on the roles of court advisers of an old King and attempt to seize power for themselves. Each player has a secret goal that they must achieve by manipulating the kingdom and advising the King on daily issues. They can also form secret alliances, spy, and accuse each other of their ambitions. One match takes about 20-30 minutes.

name: Rollin' Eggz
description: Children and parents alike, this one is for you! Collect the eggz from the chickens before they fall down! But careful, every now and then there is a nasty rotten egg to avoid. Or maybe a shiny golden egg to snag and restore a heart to keep playing. Try the oldie but goldie gameplay with a fresh and colorful look and a revamped game design! Flash eggz, bombs, ladybugs and even a shy snail are here to complete the experience! But wait, there's more! Double more! Besides the classic Rolling game mode, you also get the Raining and Rainbow modes, for a 3-in-1 ultimate eggz catching experience! Did we even mention the three playable characters? What are you waiting for? Join the eggz craze and help Philip, Terry and Maggie fill their baskets!

name: WCW World Championship Wrestling: The Main Event
description: Sin descripción

name: Undead's Building
description: Operate an elevator in a zombie invested apartment where the undead wander the hallways! Use the security monitors to check each floor and then move between floors as quickly as possible to pick up survivors. Delay and the undead will eat them before you get there.

name: Un Indien Dans La Ville
description: Un Indien Dans La Ville is an adventure game on Game Boy, developed by Titus Interactive and published by Titus Interactive.

name: The Swords of Ditto: Mormo's Curse
description: Now reimagined and expanded in the new Mormo's Curse update, The Swords of Ditto is a roguelite action RPG that creates a unique adventure for each new hero of legend in the relentless fight against the evil Mormo.

name: This Is Snooker
description: Sin descripción

name: The Game of Harmony
description:
Are you smart?
Do you have quick reflexes?

You are a single spinning sphere. You face a series of fantastic computer-generated puzzles - 50 of them. Your goal? Knock similar balls together and make them disappear.

Sound simple? It's not. Each puzzle is different and requires a different strategy. Hit the wrong balls together and they multiply. If you don't clear the screen in time, the whole thing explodes.

Whatever you've done before, forget it. Harmony's a whole new ball game. Beat this baby and you can call yourself good. Until then, you're just a pretender.

name: Twist & Match
description: Challenge your spatial visualization skills and make optimal moves to build combos!

name: Lucle
description: Sin descripción

name: My Jurassic Farm 2018
description: You start with just a compsognathus, an empty field and a few pennies. You have to feed your dino, take care of it and improve its living conditions!

name: Moai VI: Unexpected Guests
description: From vibrant jungles bursting with color, to an underwater wonderland teeming with aquatic life, to a cluster of floating islands, you'll traverse many magical lands filled with miracles. You'll also go toe-to-toe with awesome giants, outwit clever jellyfish and pet cute Manu-Ai to receive mana. Characters that range from the charming Posei-Don to the wicked Moko-Moko lizards will make each encounter a memorable one.

name: Puzzle Herder
description: Oh, no! The animals on Dora's farm have escaped and wandered off into the wilderness. Help her get all of the cute little critters back safely in this challenging puzzle game!

name: Warhammer 40,000: Inquisitor - Martyr Deluxe Edition
description:
This first-person action-RPG is set in the grim future of the 41st millennium. You are a member of the Inquisition, tasked with carrying out the will of the Emperor at all costs. Martyr takes place in the Caligari Sector, a remote area of the Imperium filled with hundreds of star systems and thousands of planets. This open-world sandbox game is influenced by the actions of players worldwide, which has a direct impact on the overall story line in the persistent universe. You can experience a variety of missions and fight tactical battles in destructible environments. There are three character classes to choose from, with a robust customization system. This massive game features a deep crafting system, customized loadouts, and 4-player co-op.

The first action-rpg game taking place in the immensely popular universe of Warhammer 40, 000
An open-world sandbox game in a persistent universe, with a huge variety of missions
Brutal and tactical combat through a storyline influenced by the community of players
3 different classes of characters, each with a deep playstyle customization system
A vast universe to explore and various planets to investigate, solo or with up to 4 team members
Deluxe Edition:

Imperial decoration: two statues representing the Emperor’s faithful subjects to decorate the game hub.
Skull trail: this exclusive animation will make blazing skulls appear behind you like footprints.
Skulldust Emote: Surround yourself with the dust of your enemies’ crushed skulls using this exclusive emote.
Game soundtrack (only for PlayStation 4 TM players.)
Region May Vary: Check Terms & Conditions for more info. Contact Us to verify region. All games sold are compatible with local consoles.

name: Black Clover: Quartet Knights Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Middle-earth: Shadow of Mordor - Legion Edition
description: ight through Mordor and uncover the truth of the spirit that compels you, discover the origins of the Rings of Power, build your legend and ultimately confront the evil of Sauron in this new chronicle of Middle-earth.

name: Days of Prophecy
description:
"Any fan of Tactics RPGs will love Days of Prophecy, our new game for iPhone and iPad. It features deep strategic battles, beautiful graphics, and a rich cast of characters for you to train and customize.

Come experience a grand adventure in a world of magic and fantasy!"

name: Gobble Dash
description: Sin descripción

name: Gnosia
description:
Gnosia is a Sci-Fi Social Deduction RPG in which you will engage in discussion with a variety of unique characters, with the aim of identifying the Gnosia among the group. Players will have to use what information they can gather during the discussions to ascertain whom they think is Gnosia and then vote to put them into cold sleep. As you progress, your abilities will improve - but so will those of the crew.

As the numbers of crew members, Gnosia, and various “roles” increase, it will become increasingly difficult to determine who is telling the truth. Work in collaboration with or against other crew members to ensure your survival until the end.

name: Overreign
description:
Overreign is a game that turns the legendary game Age of Empires II into first person (3D). 
 
The idea of the game is that you play as the king of your village and you must command your units as in the original games, only from another perspective. This leads to new and strange situations: for example, you must climb watchtowers to see what is behind the walls of your city or you must go with your army to attack the enemy bases.

name: Smoosh!
description: Sin descripción

name: Red
description:
"The sequel to my 'yellow' game is here!
Can you make the screen red in 50 levels?
Each level has its own logic."

name: Black
description: The sequel to my 'yellow' and 'red' games is here! Can you make the screen black in 50 levels? Each level has its own logic.

name: Worm UP!
description:
Worm UP! is a new game that brings you a unique experience. A cute worm-like character climbs rocks by jumping left and right. During his journey the worm faces angry birds that don't like worms and have declared war. Luckily he has a crossbow gun to shoot up his enemies. Dodge the spikes and other hazards that could easily kill the worm. Just don't rush when lava is close. It is slow enough.

Worm UP is a single tap simple game. The game consists of level based short challenges. It is easy to learn, but hard to master. Even kids will enjoy it. Because of smooth progression of level difficulties you should be able to relax and experience the state of flow while playing Worm UP. The game art is stylized and also unique.

Have a happy time with your family playing Worm UP in turns. You like to play games while watching TV? Go ahead and score the levels one by one really quick.

name: Absolutely: A True Crime Story
description: A real story, about an actual criminal named Keanu Reeves, made in RPGMaker with stock assets.

name: Runa's Date
description: Sin descripción

name: Time Zone Arena
description: TimeZoneArena is an online multi-player FPS game. The core around the game is that time resource should be losing automatically. when time goes to zero player will die directly according to the concept, the player who get resources more will be the winner.

name: Re[Map]
description: ReMap is a multiplayer 2D tank shooter where the controls are randomized every round. Pick your color, hop in a tank, and figure out which button is shoot before your opponent kills you.

name: Instinct: Survival
description: Trust only your instincts in this world.

name: Arcade Simulator
description: Arcade Simulator is a game that will help you remember the era of arcade machines. Play in 20 arcade machines with your own games, get achievements, climb the leaderboard and become the best player in this game room!

name: Zero Strain
description: Zero Strain takes the intricate abilities of a MOBA and distills them into a hyper-fast top-down shooter. Descend into the depths of uncharted dimensions and destroy everything in your path!

name: Touhou Dark Echoes
description: Touhou: Dark Echoes is a narrative single player puzzle platformer set in both Gensokyo and the Outside World. As Sumireko Usami, switch your way between worlds to solve puzzles and uncover the mystery of the Dark Echoes with the help of familiar Touhou characters.

name: Hand to Hand Combat
description: Break down doors, point your fingers, clear the room and survive in Hand to Hand Combat; A Virtual Reality Action game for Valve Index Controllers!! Slow Motion, Physics, Secret Agents!

name: Ring the City
description: In Ring the City, you use rings to fight. Charge the rings and cast powerful magic. Choose your rings wisely and build your own ring squad. Collect powerful rings and discover the truth of the world!

name: Moonbuggy VR
description: A simulation of the Apollo 17 lunar rover exploration in virtual reality. Realistically recreated to give you a real sense of what it was like to be on the moon and explore these huge distances with the rover.

name: ReThink | Evolved 3
description: ReThink | Evolved 3 is a Puzzle Game in a futuristic setting, that features a variety of Puzzles that utilize Lasers and the behavior of light and it's colors. Use new features and mechanics to puzzle your way through the game's beautiful world.

name: Tabletop Playground
description: Play any kind of tabletop game you want online! You make the rules in a physically simulated 3D sandbox. Or create your own games using the integrated editor and share them with the world!

name: Astro4x
description: A Single Player Turn-Based 4X Strategy Indie Game. It's like Chess in Space.

name: The Grandmaster
description:
This is another humble Beat-Fu game which has a lot of playability, and loads of fun. Follow the journey of the Grand Master, and experience the silly, frustrating and action-packed adventures all in a simple button-tapping game.
In this game, you must beat the ninjas who want you to pay for your bill. But you're a Grand Master, and you don't follow those rules. One button is all it takes to beat these pesky ninjas, and the goal is to do this every single day.

name: Dress out!
description: This game has no gameplay and no story. Just only naked girls. Think, it's seems enough.

name: Cage of the Succubi
description: Having had a spell cast on him, our hero awakens in a mysterious castle. His only options are to serve the castle's lord as a slave, or with some help and hard work, escape.

name: Malcom's Day
description: Malcom's Day® is a platformer whose development was influenced by a strong passion for videogames of the '80s and '90s and by the beautiful experiences lived in the daily life of those years. Developed by a guy from the '90s.

name: Believe: Paranormal Psychic Adventure
description: Believe: Psychic Paranormal Adventure is an RPG with real-time twin-stick shooting action battles! Unravel the mysteries of the universe as Todd Black, who gets abducted by aliens, given incredible psychic powers, and is the only one who can save our world from total dimensional meltdown!

name: KreisReise
description: This game is the Metroidvania action game. It is 2D map, but, with a characteristic rotary view, the screen scrolls and turns. You get weapons and actions by exploration, and let's conquer the tower.

name: There's a Butcher Around
description: There's a Butcher Around, a brutal hide & seek. You control Vinny, you're at home with your friends, but Bill the butcher has escaped from the asylum and is looking for new victims. During the game you will have to find a place to hide, every round, Bill the butcher chooses a spot in the house to investigate, are you well hidden?

name: DoomAI
description: Kind of DOTA game, experience the adventure experience of ai zi and hu together during the game. If you are a fan of casual games, then you must not miss.

name: Genius! Nazi-Girl GoePpels-Chan Ep2
description: This is a slightly different history to the world we know. Having been appointed propaganda minister at the age of 14, the genius girl. Geri Goeppels, together with her private secretaries Rolly and Flute, is up to all sorts of secret maneuvers. This time,I'm going to make a propaganda animation.

name: Tower Arena
description: Tower Arena is turn-based tactical PVP game. For centuries Regulars tried to go up the Tower, with most of them dying on the way. Will you be able to advance to unknown heights. To become a Tower's Ranker ? Or maybe... a king himself ?

name: Mundus: Impossible Universe 2
description: Play the brand new match3 game "Mundus: Impossible Universe 2" and again join the great shaman on a galactic journey!

name: Foreign Frugglers
description: The Fruggle is real! Four brave survivors need to protect mother earth from spacey invaders in this pixelated arcade style 2d shoot 'm up.

name: Russian Life Simulator
description: The most realistic simulator of the life of a Russian person. Collect pension from birth, collect bottles to survive and become part of an exciting life-long story.

name: Heaven's Voice Feast of Famine
description: Action puzzle RPG with over 100 levels, 8 playable character, that drastically effect the game play and, 4 game modes.

name: Cold Silence
description: This is minimalistic horror platformer about survival at snowy mountains. Follow the mysterious voice from the radio, fight your fears and reveal the truth!

name: Twisting Mower
description: Lawn mower cart race!? This is race game that competes by time attack with people around the world. The place where you cut the lawn can run fast. Let's aim for the fastest record on the changing track. Run with the ghost of the time attack record of players all over the world and aim for the ranking first place!

name: Night of the Shrub Part 3
description: Night of the Shrub Part 3 is a short, visual novel, with a single story line rife with odd happenings - The continuing adventures of Shrub and his friends as they travel to other worlds and back again in an attempt to save the creepy Old Twermbly Place.

name: Narazumono
description: Narazumono is a roguelike game.

name: The Legion: FringeBound
description: The Legion: FringeBound is a turn-based, squad focused roguelike. Lead your party of heroes into the depths below, finding new allies, new gear, and new enemies as you delve deeper. Level up and expand your roster of colorful characters as you attempt to stop Vlad at the heart of The Fringe.

name: Nether: The Untold Chapter
description: The new Nether iteration is a multiplayer survival game with its action set in a post-apocalyptic city, filled with mutated monsters – just like its predecessor. One of the most unique survival experiences has been given a new look, optimizations, fresh content, new monsters, bug fixes and a powerful anti-cheat system to ensure a fun and fair game-experience.

name: Trapper
description: This is a game where users operate the trapper to place bombs and remove obstacles and enemies to complete missions. The missions include collecting gold orbs, defeating key enemies, and protecting targets.

name: 梦涯
description: As the third bomb of the studio work, we turned our attention to the Republic of China. In that chaotic era, players will experience a tortuous life with the protagonist, let us wait and see.

name: Monster X Monster
description: This is a Rogue-like RPG card game. You team up 4 monsters to escape the castle defeating all the heroes. Monsters need freedom!

name: Welcome To... Chichester OVN : The Beach
description: Sometime during your holiday in England, yourself and your friends receive an invite to "The Beach". Thinking the invite is for a private beach party, they are sorely disappointed when they end up at a haunted...

name: Hippocampus
description: Gothic Hack & Slash with gore action and platform phases. Join Lord Moebius in search of his lost betrothed in a horrifying journey in his memories made vivid through a powerful...

name: Wheelie King VR
description: Realistic motorbike simulator. Real wrist throttle and clutch! 4 camera angles.

name: Witches' Legacy: The Charleston Curse - Collector's Edition
description:
End the Charleston Curse before it wipes out an entire family and save a young girl in Witches' Legacy: The Charleston Curse! After finding out that you are the last living relative to a young orphan named Lynn, you discover the terrifying tale of her family. The Charlestons have been systematically killed by a witch and now it’s up to you to protect Lynn! Confront the terrifying witch and save Lynn in Witches' Legacy: The Charleston Curse!

This is a special Collector's Edition release full of exclusive extras you won't find in the standard version. The Collector’s Edition includes:

- Bonus gameplay
- Integrated Strategy Guide
- Stunning soundtrack

name: Miss Cat
description: Miss Cat is an independent adventure puzzle-solving game in which players control Monica to find the hidden truth in an unknown world.

name: OldWar
description: OldWar - a game in the genre of RTS (real-time strategy).

name: Falnarion Tactics II
description: The story of Nerfelo continues with Falnarion Tactics II. Revisit old areas and discover new ones. Fight alongside friends old and new as you take the role of Tolem, leader of The Black Order. A group clan-destined to defeat the totalitarian Kingdom of Inelda.

name: Aliens: Colonial Marines - Collector's Edition
description:
Buckle up, soldier! Welcome to Aliens: Colonial Marines. Created by Gearbox, the critically acclaimed and fan-favorite developers of Borderlands and Brothers In Arms, you and your friends will become the most badass military outfit in the galaxy – the US Colonial Marines. It’s up to you to not just survive, but wipe out the Xeno infestation.

The Collector's Edition Pack includes:

- Plasma Pulse Rifle - This special rifle fires charged balls of plasma annihilating any enemies caught in its path.
- Sonic Electronic Ball Breakers - Landing on the floor, this special, high-tech grenade bounces several feet into the air before unleashing a large electrical charge that fries anything in the vicinity.
- US Colonial Marines Academy firing range - Test your speed and accuracy with any gun in different scenarios & navigate multi-room obstacle courses, set on the U.S.S. Sephora, with enemy and innocent civilians targets.

name: Attack of the Retro Bots
description: 10,000 levels of retro robot sci-fi action. Choose which maps you play, from super easy to practically impossible. Save Earth from the Retro Bot invasion. Playable as a desktop first person shooter, or in VR on the HTC Vive, Oculus Rift and WMR.

name: Tohu
description: Tohu is a classic Point & Click adventure game. It takes place in a small world based on fish-planets, floating in an ether. You will explore it with an unusual little girl who keeps a secret: she can turn into a Cubehead - her alter-ego, who can carry big things and make big deeds.

name: Vibur: Disintegration - Episode 1
description: Vibur Disintegration is a game guided by a dense narrative told in the Visual Novel style, complemented by combat with piloted robots (Abidis) in a turn-based strategy system. The story unfolds in the midst of a interplanetary war, in which Abidis play a pivotal role in military conflicts.

name: Magician of Fire
description: Burn enemies with the power of fire!

name: Red Hot Vengeance
description: He had one rule: No killing women or children. When a hitman is double-crossed by his employer, he brings forth a night of carnage and bloodshed.

name: Aliens: Colonial Marines - Extermination Edition
description: Buckle up, soldier! Welcome to Aliens: Colonial Marines. Created by Gearbox, the critically acclaimed and fan-favorite developers of Borderlands and Brothers In Arms, you and your friends will become the most badass military outfit in the galaxy – the US Colonial Marines. It’s up to you to not just survive, but wipe out the Xeno infestation.

name: Anthropomachy
description: Get ready for conquering the world as a God! Show compassion to those who have nothing and they will love you. Take from those who have everything and they will fear you. Gain worshipers, fight skepticism and make the Earth belong to the gods once again! Long live the Greek Gods!

name: The Rescue of Mermaids
description: Travel through the depths of the ocean with Garry the octopus-man and save your mermaids.

name: The Language of Love
description: Mitsuki, an aimless young man studying to take his university entrance exams, falls for a young single mother who lives in his apartment complex. A relationship develops between these mismatched social outcasts, and then...

name: Settlers of Orion
description: A turn based hybrid board game that combines elements from Settlers of Catan with elements of space exploration. It features a great game to game advancement system that will lead to huge replayability while you play games to unlock more races and powerful artifacts.

name: Autumn's End
description: Autumn's End is a point and click adventure game about boxes, bones, and childhood homes.

name: Ruine
description: Ruine is a sidescrolling fantasy RPG with roguelike elements and a souls-like setting. The world of Ruine is amorphous, its past long forgotten by most. Forests and ruins are inhabited by creatures that once lived, and now refuse to die. Use what you can find, craft or purchase to eradicate them.

name: Legion of Scorn
description: Retro, twin-stick shooter based in sci-fi and cyberpunk roots. Battle through the Legion.exe research arena against the latest in military robotics technology. The only way to earn your freedom is to battle your way through countless waves of enemies and survive the Legion of Scorn.

name: Duskless: The Clockwork Army
description: Rise up against robot troops that are crushing the kingdom you love in this thrilling match-three steampunk adventure! Can you stop the onslaught and restore Etherpoint City to its former glory?

name: The Fifth Horseman
description: The Fifth Horseman is a narrative adventure game, set in a fantasy-medieval world, where you will experience many unique stories. After years of war, hunger and diseases mankind finds itself on the verge of extinction and it's up to you to decide its fate.

name: Queen City Chaos
